issue.title: [IR] Add relation identifier to RelBase in compute IR
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14148](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14148). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Based on the discussion here https://github.com/duckdb/duckdb/pull/2331#discussion_r716728607, it looks like there's a need to add global-to-query identifier for tables.
